Lille chief names his asking price for Arsenal target Nicolas Pepe

Arsenal will have to break their transfer record to sign Nicolas Pepe after Lille slapped an €80million (£72m) price tag on the prolific winger.

Speaking about Pepe to Telefoot on Sunday morning, Campos set his value for the 23-year-old: ‘€80million. But [any club] will also have to convince the player.’

French newspaper L’Equipe recently claimed that Lille were open to selling Pepe in the January window, with Arsenal in pole position to prise him away.
